mapper.select: select detail_id, place_id, tel, openingHours, closingHours, dayoff, contact, parking, createdAt, updatedAt from details order by detail_id
mapper.insert: insert details set tel = #{tel}, openingHours = #{openingHours}, closingHours = #{closingHours}, dayoff = #{dayoff}, contact = #{contact}, parking = #{parking}, where detail_id = #{detailId}
mapper.update: update details set tel = #{tel}, openingHours = #{openingHours}, closingHours = #{closingHours}, dayoff = #{dayoff}, contact = #{contact}, parking = #{parking}, where detail_id = #{detailId}
